author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINS OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINS OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN MEXICO... As of 1:00 AM CDT Sun Jun 29 the center of Two was located near 19.7, -95.7 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINS OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN MEXICO... As of 1:00 AM CDT Sun Jun 29 the center of Two was located near 19.7, -95.7 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Two (AT2/AL022025)
